title: What do i do if...
body:
Enemy jungle locks in lee sin and im forced to jungle on my team?  Every time this has happened in the past the lee sin has danced on my and my teams corpses throughout the game.

Im silver 3 and a support main btw.

replies.body: pick a person who can 1v 1 lee sin and counter gank

You pick nunu and ult to zone him from your team
You pick pantheon and fight 
You pick wuking and peel him off your caries
You pick malphite and laugh as he tickles you
Thanks for the ideas.  Any one else?

Not that I can think of. Just play around Lee
Ward a lot for your lanes
Look for counter ganks
Always base if your at 1/2 health and think he's in your jungle
